info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 5:09PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Umatilla and central Union Counties through 615 PM PDT... At 508 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hilgard, or 11 miles west of La Grande, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... La Grande, Elgin, Island City, Imbler, Summerville, Hilgard and Starkey. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
